title: Bowl, ca. 1800
provenance: Cecil Davis Ltd., London; 1963 P. Warren, NY
description: Round bowl with large turned-over rim, sits on tall stem with central knop,high domed base with cut blazes at bottom edge; sides of bowl cut with double band of facets, a triple band of facets on over-turned rim; pontil mark bottom; glass dark clear.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-156.
